title: Sidewalks Entertainment
overview: Over the years, the Sidewalks Entertainment format has morphed into what it is today: a highly-viewed, celebrity-based interview and music program on TV and web.The series can be seen throughout the USA and Caribbean on national networks (YTA and The Family Channel), local stations, college TV stations, and regional cable networks, as well as some online channels, including the program's 24-hour streaming channel at Sidewalks.TV. The Sidewalks' segments are also available on many popular apps, including Apple Store, Google Play, Roku, Fire TV, and on podcasts, like I-Heart, Spotify and Apple Video Podcast
